title: Tikanga Māori-Based Mobile Microlearning Course

context.additional_context: A language education program reflecting Māori cultural sensitivity, with a digital device-based microlearning environment.

learning_goals: Learners can perform self-directed learning at least three times per week using mobile learning tools based on the Tikanga Māori principles.
Learners can apply at least five basic conversational expressions (greetings, gratitude, daily questions, etc.) in situational contexts within the Māori cultural framework.
Learners can share culture-based learning activities with peer learners at least twice per week using collaboration features within a mobile platform.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
